enWisdom: Amusement is from the fruits of ignorance
Amusement is the provision of foolishness
A believer loathes idle play and likes to work hard

Wisdom: اهْجُرِ اللَّهْوَ فَإِنَّكَ لَمْ تُخْلَقْ عَبَثاً فَتَلْهُوَ وَلَمْ [لن‏] تُتْرَكْ سُدًى فَتَلْغُوَ
enWisdom: Keep away from amusements for indeed you have not been created aimlessly so that you may be amused, and you have not been left without purpose so that you may indulge in vanities

Wisdom: أَبْعَدُ النَّاسِ عَنِ الصَّلَاحِ الْمُسْتَهْتَرُ بِاللَّهْوِ
enWisdom: The furthest of all people from righteousness is one who is [excessively] fond of amusement

Wisdom: أَبْعَدُ النَّاسِ مِنَ النَّجَاحِ الْمُسْتَهْتَرُ بِاللَّهْوِ وَالْمِزَاحِ
enWisdom: The furthest of all people from prosperity is one who is fond of amusement and jest

Wisdom: غَشَّكَ مَنْ أَرْضَاكَ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَأَغْرَاكَ بِالْمَلَاهِي وَالْهَزْلِ
مَا خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ أَمْراً عَبَثاً فَيَلْهُوَ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has not created anything in vain so that He may be entertained

Wisdom: مَا تَرَكَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ أَمْراً سُدًى فَيَلْغُوَ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not abandon anything to futility thereby rendering it void

Wisdom: لَا يُفْلِحُ مَنْ وَلِهَ بِاللَّعِبِ وَاسْتُهْتِرَ بِاللَّهْوِ وَالطَّرَبِ
enWisdom: One who takes pleasure in idle sport and is fond of amusement and entertainment does not become successful

Wisdom: احْذَرِ الْهَزْلَ وَاللَّعِبَ وَكَثْرَةَ الْمَزْحِ وَالضَّحِكِ وَالتُّرَّهَاتِ
enWisdom: Be wary of jesting, playing, excessive joking, [excessive] laughing, and vain talks
The worst of speech is babble
Too much joking is a sign of ignorance
